body: Accidentally red this without reading the other prequels mind someone send me a link of the others?

SLUT DETECTED. his girlfriend is was already a slut even before they become lover. In CH.1, when they first fucked, there's no sign of defloration. Meaning that she fucked bunch of guys in the village, before she met him. And she keep fucking anyone else, while his boyfriend away at Tokyo.

Sentiment Arc has a weird ending (it is a harem, cheating, NTR or a love story???)... Feels like the story could’ve gone on for 1 or 2 more chapters at least, ending was kind of open-ended ... and the childhood friend got a pretty rotten guy on her hands.

I kinda disliked this one. The art was fantastic, and, even if there was an admitted cheat, the story wasn't too bad. But, I dunno, maybe the  cliffanger end, with an implied plan of NTR, maybe the... dunno... nonchalance of the fiance toward said cheating... something in this one tickled me the wrong way.
I smell NTR in the air. And also, possibly some dark past incoming. Probably involving lots of whoring.
